name: delete-merchants-merchantId-splitConfigurations-splitConfigurationId-rules-ruleId
description:
Deletes the split configuration rule specified in the path.

To make this request, your API credential must have the following [role](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/api-credentials#api-permissions):
* Management API - SplitConfiguration read and write

merchantId.description: The unique identifier of the merchant account.

splitConfigurationId.description: The unique identifier of the split configuration.

$ul: **description**: Your description for the split configuration.
**rules**: Array of rules that define the split configuration behavior.
**splitConfigurationId**: Unique identifier of the split configuration.
**stores**: List of stores to which the split configuration applies.
**detail**: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

**instance**: A unique URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.
